Title: Relates to agricultural assessments on property which is converted for purposes of oil or gas exploration or solar development
Summary: Provides that property receiving an agricultural assessment which is converted for purposes of oil or gas exploration shall be subject to payments equaling five times the taxes saved in the last year in which the land benefited from an agricultural assessment; exempts property converted for solar development from such payments.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to payments associated with the conversion of land subject to an agricultural assessment by virtue of oil or gas exploration or extraction activity or solar development
